content: I am a big animal lover and get very excited around animals. I mean only the petting ones. You won't find me excited around a lion.
I loveee to paint, draw and create beautiful stuffs from waste. If you'll ever visit me, you can find a pretty dooddle on my wall.
My taste buds are always on a wild adventure, and I love nothing more than food. Let's eat, drink, and be merry!
I'm a Netflix fanatic with a passion for binge-watching my favorite shows and movies. Wait, let me hit that 'play next episode' button!
I love making new friends and having a good time. I'm always on the lookout for new faces to chat with and new stories to hear.
I want to travel the whole world and try many adventurous activities. But first, I want to explore India.
